WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not an issue, set bonuses are auto-activated.
WorkItem.Description:
Windhawk shows up in the mage and warlock lists, even though they have no way to get the bonus.
 
It shows up in Retribution also.  It takes a really "special" Ret. to be running around with the Windhawk bonus.  Likewise, only exceptional ProtWarriors will have the Clefthoof 3-piece bonus.
 
Perhaps Item::Type and/or RequiredClasses should be moved down to Stats?  Might be too big of a change for a relatively minor benefit.
